forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 89. South wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 3am. Partly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. Southwest wind 1 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 5 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 62. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

forecast.name: Tonight

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
